sense.name: make (more) comprehensible
sense.examples: Harris clarified his position on gun control at the last press conference. She clarified that peacekeeping made up only 20 per cent of the work of the UN. She clarified she contacted a representative of the airport.

sense.name: make clear by removing impurities or solids, as by heating
sense.examples: By the way, I clarified the butter myself. They cracked their malt in a coffee-grinder, brewed in a cooking pot, clarified the beer in a swimming-pool filter, and hand-bottled their product.
